feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: Welcome to my blog!
entry.content:
I just started writing posts recently, and I will try to write some fun stuff here.

I do have a post about technical details like pytorch, linux etc. at here if you are interested in. (Note that they are being reformated right now to make the contents in order).
entry.summary: I just started writing posts recently, and I will try to write some fun stuff here.
